title: Can this acc be delted or locked?
body:
Hey so today I was browsing one of my older email accounts and it shows that it was being used to run this account and pay for in game currency, thankfully not from my own wallet, I managed to change the passswd on the acc but am looking for something more permanent to stop it. 
Cheers

replies.body:
Hey there,

You can [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support to have your account locked if you wish.
